question:
Consider the following Indus Valley sites with what they are known for:
  1. Lothal - the only site with artificial brick dockyard
  2. Rangpur - the only site where rice husk has been found
  3. Chanhudaro - the only site without a citadel
Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: Chanhudaro is the only site without any citadel. Archaeologists have also discovered shell-ornament makers and bead maker shops from this site. Lothal is the only site with artificial brick dockyard. Rangpur is the only site where rice husk has been found. Rangpur and Lothal are located in Gujarat, and Chanhudaro in Pakistan.
